landingConfig.scriptureHelperLine: Read slowly. Let Scripture set the frame.

scripturePassages.text: Witness Babylon collapse and hear the call to come out of her so you do not share in her plagues.
Flee from the midst of Babylon, save your life, do not be found among her.
Friendship with the world is enmity with God—choose allegiance accordingly.
Present your body as a living sacrifice and be transformed by renewing your mind.
Come out and be separate; touch no unclean thing.

deliverable.title: Babylon Audit + One Obedience Step
deliverable.description: This tool surfaces the pattern, exposes the fear, and ends with one decisive act of obedience.
deliverable.tagline: This ends with a step—no overprocessing, no overwhelm.

whoItsFor.text: You feel uneasiness you can’t fully name
You want alignment more than comfort
You’re ready to obey, not just learn

whoItsNotFor.text: A “no-cost” course with no change required

processSteps.title: Watch / read the five segments

processSteps.title: Complete the Babylon Audit (guided)
processSteps.body: Capture the pattern, fear, and obedience step with thumb-friendly taps.

processSteps.title: Take one step—then begin Detox 101 while the window is open
processSteps.body: Lock in a contract, renounce the agreement, and move forward.

detoxBridge.title: Don’t manage what was exposed—detox it.
detoxBridge.body: If you identified a real pattern today, you don’t need more information—you need a process. Babylon Detox 101 is a structured 4-week path to separate, replace, and rebuild alignment one area at a time.

faqItems.question: Is this fear-based?
faqItems.answer: No. This is obedience-based—conviction without shame, clarity without panic.

faqItems.question: Do I need to leave my church?
faqItems.answer: Start with discernment and obedience. This course trains alignment, not isolation.

faqItems.question: How long does Detox 101 take?
faqItems.answer: Four weeks, paced and focused on one area at a time.

faqItems.question: What if I’m new to Scripture?
faqItems.answer: Perfect. Scripture speaks first here—everything is explained plainly and applied practically.

microDrillPrompts: Name the cost of compromise in one sentence.

auditConfig.instructions: Move through each step carefully. Hold to renounce with intention.
